Title: Directs the commissioner of the department of health to apply for a waiver to implement a work requirement for able-bodied adult recipients of Medicaid
Summary: Directs the commissioner of the department of health to apply for a waiver to implement a work requirement for able-bodied adult recipients of Medicaid.
ActClause: AN ACT directing the commissioner of health to apply for a waiver to implement a work requirement for able-bodied adult recipients of Medicaid
